compliance.confidentiality: We understand PHI protection requirements. All patient data is encrypted, access is logged, and we provide Business Associate Agreements for HIPAA compliance.

faq.question: Is SummarizePDF HIPAA compliant?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer Business Associate Agreements (BAA), maintain HIPAA-compliant infrastructure, and encrypt all PHI. Our platform is used by hospitals and research institutions nationwide.

faq.question: How accurate is the AI for medical terminology?
faq.answer: Our AI is trained on medical literature and understands clinical terminology, drug names, and study designs. Summaries preserve key statistics and clinical findings. However, always apply clinical judgment.

faq.question: Can I use this for patient records with PHI?
faq.answer: Yes, with a signed BAA. We encrypt all data, provide audit logs, and never use your documents to train our AI. Many hospitals use us for chart review.

faq.question: What's the best plan for medical researchers?
faq.answer: The Pro plan ($19/mo) is perfect for individual researchers with 500 pages/month. Research teams should consider our Team plan ($49/mo) for collaboration and shared libraries.

faq.question: Can I export summaries with citations?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Export as PDF, Word, or plain text with automatic page references. Perfect for research papers and clinical documentation.

faq.question: Do you offer institutional pricing?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide custom enterprise pricing for hospitals, universities, and large research organizations. Contact sales for institutional licensing.
